website_summaries.verdict: Fluker’s premium hermit crab diet is loaded with protein from eggs, fish, and shrimp, specially made to satisfy a hermit crab’s core dietary needs, and is extra-affordable, making this food an excellent deal.
pros: Fish meal, ground corn, herring meal, dried whole egg, soybean oil, and shrimp meal are the first 6 ingredients
cons: It would be convenient if this pellet-based hermit crab food was available in larger containers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hermit Crabs
customer_reviews.text: Our family pets seem to love the food and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Houser

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crab pellets
customer_reviews.text: Have a hard time finding this at a store. My Hermit Crabs love this stuff. Such a GREAT price too!! Thank you Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: leezasez

customer_reviews.title: Hermit Crab Pellets
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a problem with my hermit crabs eating the premium pellets. As for the taste, I haven’t tried any but they smell good.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: My crabs don't seem to care for it much.
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs don't like it much, they seem to prefer Jurassidiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crab
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t seem to eat it . But he didn’t !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much better than buying it in the store! larger container for a much lower price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hermit crabs love it. . Excellent value and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Beth Boal

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our hermit crab is not interested in these pellets and won't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy S.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The lid was broken when I received it and 2/3 of the food was missing it wasn't in the shipping box either. It was simply gone! I definitely would not recommend this product! What waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Affordable food
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs eat it but the pellets are kind of small.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Toxic
customer_reviews.text: Hermit crab pellets are very toxic to hermit crabs. Don't bother. Check the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: uwu

product_meta.title: Fluker's Premium Pellet Diet - Food for Hermit Crabs, 3 Ounces Each
product_meta.description: Size:85gHermit Crabs need a nutritious daily diet to ensure lively behavior and healthy growth. Fluker's Premium Hermit Crab Pellet Food is rich in protein and nutrients your pet needs to thrive.
feature_bullets: Land hermit crabs eat small amounts of food at a time, and prefer to eat at night, Feed them only what they can consume in a 24-hour period
